EmailTemplate.description: sent to LD consultants and 16/17 contacts
EmailTemplate.name: Mar 2017 LD consultants survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Live Different Consultant 2017/18 program advice
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I hope that 2017 has been going well for you so far! It's been a while since I have been in touch (it has been a busy year as we have launched a 3rd road team, focused on serving Indigenous communities). I am reaching out to you as you are on our list of educators who are willing to be a Live Different Consultant. We are looking for your advice as we plan our 2017/18 school programming. Over the past 3 years, our teacher consultants have provided ideas and advice that has resulted in important improvements to our program. Thank you so much for your continued help; you are making a real difference in students' lives by contributing in this way.
Here is the survey link:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfG_GoCI87xuG7BDNCTvI7KDYnMAgBAMkoPrUugjkTu8MyzJw/viewform?usp=pp_url&entry.105534526=True&entry.1840663298={!Contact.Name}&entry.116583257={!Account.Name}&entry.103038865={!Contact.Id}
If you prefer to give your feedback conversationally, I would be happy to chat with you and can be reached anytime at the numbers below.
Thanks in advance,
Ryan Wood
Ryan Wood Director of Canadian Programs
Live Different Suite B3 - 15 Wellington St. North Hamilton, ON L8R 1M7 Canada
905-929-1662 Cell 905-777-1662 Office 905-777-8117 Fax ryan@livedifferent.com
www.livedifferent.com
